name: Ethereum Donation Plugin
author: alexss23

sections.description:
Accept Ethereum (ETH) donations online with WordPress plugin. Let your users make transactions with MetaMask. Simple and free.

Usage

After Installing and Activating the plugin, go to WordPress Admin Dashboard, choose

Settings >> Ethereum Donation

and setup your Ethereum account.

After saving, just paste the following shortcode at any place your want to show Ethereum Donation link

[ethereum_donation_link]
sections.installation: Installing plugin is just like installing other WordPress plugins.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing plugin is just like installing other WordPress plugins.

short_description: Collect more Ethereum (ETH) donations online with WordPress plugin.
description:

upgrade_notice: You should upgrade the plugin to get more function and faster speed.
